TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationIDAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ApplicationIDAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ApplicationIDAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: Especifica a ID do aplicativo (como um GUID) para esse assembly.

span.span: Specifies the application ID (as a GUID) for this assembly.

summary.span: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

remarks.format: ## Remarks usa um GUID no construtor. takes a GUID in its constructor. Quando o registro ocorre, os componentes no assembly são instalados em um aplicativo com a ID especificada.When registration occurs, the components in the assembly are installed in an application with the given ID. ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do tipo.The following code example demonstrates the use of the type.
